entry.title: Line of Duty
entry.summary: When Steve Arnott is transferred to a police anti-corruption unit, he finds…
entry.content:
When Steve Arnott is transferred to a police anti-corruption unit, he finds his target is the city's top detective, Tony Gates. Can Gates really be as good as he appears? Arnott must engage in a cat-and-mouse struggle to uncover Gates' secret.

This fast-paced undercover series follows AC-12, an elite anti corruption unit and its investigations into police cover-ups and conspiracies. Every Season follows a new lead and a new setup making for enjoyable binging, season after season.

Everything about this show is top-notch. Writing, pacing, character-development.
5 Stars - Ayush

entry.title: The Many Saints of Newark - ***
entry.summary: Young Anthony Soprano is growing up in one of the most tumultuous…
entry.content:
Young Anthony Soprano is growing up in one of the most tumultuous eras in Newark's history, becoming a man just as rival gangsters begin to rise up and challenge the all-powerful DiMeo crime family's hold over the increasingly race-torn city.
 
This feature-length prequel to the Sopranos explores the story of the childhood and adolescence of the series’ troubled anti-hero, Tony Soprano. Played by his real-life son the story is set in the late 60s and explores the landscape of New Jersey that shaped the mob into what it became.
 
On it's own it doesn't hold up as a gangster movie, but long time Sorpranos fans will get a kick out of the casting and backstories which keep this movie slowly trudging along
 
*** - Ayush

Watch on Amazon Prime

entry.title: Trapped
entry.summary: Another subtitled murder mystery, this time from Iceland. A dismembered body is…
entry.content:
Another subtitled murder mystery, this time from Iceland.

A dismembered body is found in the river at the same time a ferry arrives at a small fishing port prompting a lockdown and investigation, But to make things worse as a bad snowstorm is threatening to cut off the town from all outside help and the under-staffed local police chief is under pressure to find answers before the severe weather forces him to set everyone, including the murderer loose.

Great pacing and the cold, dark, gritty setting makes for extra magic with the snow-filled fjords for backdrop.

*****
5 Stars - Ayush

 

Stream it on BBC 4

entry.title: Friday Night Dinner
entry.summary: Two siblings belonging to an eccentric family, join their parents to celebrate…
entry.content:
Two siblings belonging to an eccentric family, join their parents to celebrate the sabbath with a peaceful dinner every Friday night. However, despite great care, things always turn chaotic. It seems a simple premise but the show makes this event turn so many different ways with witty jabs and comic turn of events that you keep wondering how they are able to pull off the same setting into new jokes season after season.
 
If youre up for a bit of situational humour and some adoscent laughs then Friday Night Dinner is recommended to watch with mates or alone if you fancy some silly laughs.
 
"**** - 4 Stars"
-Ayush
 
 
Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Oxs7phFtT4k

entry.title: Plebs
entry.summary: Plebs is about 3 regular guys who move to the big city…
entry.content:
Plebs is about 3 regular guys who move to the big city and follows their adventures as they juggle love, friendship and work, except the show is set in the first century and the city they move to is Ancient Rome.

If you're a fan of 'The In-Betweeners' and 'Friday Night Dinner' then this one is 5 Stars also, atleast for the first few seasons.

entry.title: ”The Killing” / Forbrydelsen - *****
entry.summary: "One of my Favourite TV Murder Mysteries." - Ayush Set in the…
entry.content:
"One of my Favourite TV Murder Mysteries."

-  Ayush

Set in the cold, civilized, but often dark lands of Scandinavian this gripping thriller is miles ahead of it's American remake.

This is the Danish series that started the ScandiNoir trend for me.

There are scenes in Forbrydelsen that will haunt you, and the slow paced thriller slowly builds up to its finish with plenty of episodes to binge watch for a week.
